Supported Phones, Tablets, Game Devices, Phablets, etc.
Monster Rancher Metropolis: My Monster Rancher Archive (Andriod): FAQ: The Most Important Game Info: Supported Phones, Tablets, Game Devices, Phablets, etc.
By Lisa Shock on Sunday, January 1, 2012 - 09:31 pm:

The phones listed below are known to support the My Monster Rancher game.

*HTC Evo 4G (supersonic)

*HTC Droid Incredible (inc)

*HTC Desire (bravo)

*HTC Desire HD (ace)

°HTC Incredible 2

*HTC myTouch 4G (glacier)

°HTC myTouch 4g Slide

°LG Intuition

°Motorola Atrix HD

°Motorola Defy

*Motorola Droid X (cdma_shadow)

*Motorola Droid II (cdma_droid2)

*Motorola Droid II (cdma_droid2we)

°Motorola Droid III

°Motorola Droid 4 (not fully tested, but works)

°Samsung Exhibit II 4G

*Samsung Galaxy S Fascinate (SCH-I500)

*Samsung Galaxy S Captivate (SGH-I897)

°Samsung Galaxy Chat

*Samsung Galaxy S2 (GT-I9100)

°Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 7" (SM- T210R)

*Samsung Nexus S (crespo)

*Samsung Nexus S (crespo4g)

°Sony Ericsson Xperia, Model Number U20i, Firmware version 2.1-update1

°Sony Ericsson Xperia Arc. Not the S just the regular one.


*Listed on the developer website
°Submitted by MRM Members
